intro.title: Terms of Use for MLK Pro
intro.updated: Last update: {date}. This page is a template and should be reviewed before publication.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.body: These terms govern access to MLK Pro, a platform that helps businesses manage customers, quotes, jobs, tasks, invoices, products, and plan scans.

bullets.one: Accounts are created and managed by a business owner or admin.
bullets.two: You are responsible for keeping credentials secure.
bullets.three: Roles and permissions limit access to data and actions.

data.title: 3. Data ownership
data.body: Your company retains ownership of its data. By using MLK Pro, you grant the platform permission to store, process, and display your data as needed to provide the service.

bullets.one: Quotes are estimates and may vary based on site conditions and scope changes.
bullets.two: Price lookups use third-party sources and accuracy is not guaranteed.
bullets.three: You must validate supplier pricing before accepting or sending a quote.

billing.title: 5. Billing and payments
billing.body: Subscription fees, taxes, and payment terms are displayed in your billing settings. Unpaid invoices may result in limited access until resolved.

bullets.one: Do not upload unlawful content or misuse customer data.
bullets.two: Do not attempt to disrupt or reverse engineer the service.
bullets.three: Comply with applicable laws and client agreements.

availability.title: 7. Availability
availability.body: The platform is provided on an as-is basis. We may perform maintenance or updates that temporarily impact availability.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of liability
liability.body: MLK Pro is not liable for indirect damages, lost profits, or data loss beyond the limits required by law. Use the service at your own risk.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.body: You can cancel your subscription at any time. We may suspend access for violations of these terms or non-payment.

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms. Continued use after changes means you accept the updated terms.

terms.note: Questions? Contact your account owner or use the in-app support channel.
